publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4680 Phil Gallie: Call for a Permanent Ban on Wild Live Bird Importsâ€”That the Parliament gives support to the call for a permanent ban on live wild bird imports to Scotland and the United Kingdom by the British Veterinary Association, recognising the high level of mortality that surrounds the trapping and transporting and other cruelty factors which affect such birds and acknowledging also the health risks to other livestock of importation of these birds.
S2M-4680 Call for a Permanent Ban on Wild Live Bird Imports (lodged on 26 July 2006) Christine Grahame*, Mike Pringle*, Donald Gorrie*, Alex Neil*, Mark Ballard*, Robin Harper*
S2M-4680 Call for a Permanent Ban on Wild Live Bird Imports (lodged on 26 July 2006) Bruce Crawford*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-4680 Call for a Permanent Ban on Wild Live Bird Imports (lodged on 26 July 2006) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-4680 Call for a Permanent Ban on Wild Live Bird Imports (lodged on 26 July 2006) Carolyn Leckie*
